record.id: name="Business Call from Home" and syslanguage="en"
record.name: Business Call from Home
record.description: The Business Call from Home (BCfH) service provides employees with the ability to call national, international and (in most countries) local numbers at Company low call rates with the billing sent to the user's cost location. Unless there is a local equivalent to BCfH, the service is mandatory to all users who are using a Company paid line.
record.detailedDescription: The Business Call from Home (BCfH) service provides employees with the ability to call national, international and (in most countries) local numbers at Company low call rates with the billing sent to the user's cost location. Unless there is a local equivalent to BCfH, the service is mandatory to all users who are using a Company paid line.
